name: Rap Session
description: Walk around the house and rooms to unlock rap facts or lyrics that you might didn't heard about. After that, you can go to the studio to record a rap session, to have a glance at a music studio and a cabin. You can chill on sits and interact with music notes and exclamation marks to indicate you what to do. The point of this game is to see all the objects in the universe of rap music. It's mostly old school basics, but hidden eggs also shows recent rappers. Enjoy :))
